revised_title: An Investigation into the Temperature Variations in the Human Body in Health
tldr: This study investigates the temperature variations in the human body in healthy individuals, focusing on diurnal fluctuations and their relationship to health. The authors found that the average maximum temperature in boys around 12 years old is 99.1°F, with a diurnal variation of about 2.2°F. The study also highlights the importance of continuous observations to accurately measure temperature changes and understand their implications in health and disease.
